import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { supabase } from '../supabaseClient'; import './RSVP.css'; const RSVP = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', attendance: '', guests: 1, allergies: '', song: '', message: '' }); const [isSubmitted, setIsSubmitted] = useState(false); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Guardar RSVP en Supabase const { data, error } = await supabase.from('rsvp').insert([ { status: formData.attendance === 'yes' ? 'confirmado' : 'no', guests_count: formData.guests, message: formData.message, // Puedes agregar m√°s campos si la tabla los tiene } ]); setIsSubmitted(true); }; if (isSubmitted) { return (
